fields.helpText: Please select the venue for the event. If it doesn't exist yet - please create it! Remember to add all fields, including latitude, longitude, logo and location links / address.
Main Category for this event. This is the top-level of filters for the event. tags can be used on top of these.
Tags for this event to be shown on the events page.
In a few sentences summarise the event (before it has happened)
Square event poster
Hide event from upcoming events
Summarise the event after it has happened.
Photos and images from the event that will be used in an event gallery
Write a post about the event, recapping highlights, and including key photos.
It can be found in the URL for the event on TicketTailor
the number code (xx) in: src="https://embed.posh.vip/ticket-iframe/xxxxx/
should be 8 digits
If there is a custom event page outside of the CMS item page you would like to display

messages.pattern: Must be alphanumerical and not contain any spaces or special characters

fields.helpText: Optionally have the header full screen as opposed to the half-screen one
Optional Highlight color for borders and accents / defaults to white
Give an estimated read time for the blog, (250 words per minute on average)
1:1 resolution (square) recommended
16:9 Horizontal Resolution recommended (for banner on blog post page)
A summary or "bio"  of the blog post that appears on blog post grid
Optional Video Link (suggested: Youtube / Vimeo) - video section will play above the blog body. If you just want a video in line, then consider using an 'embed' in the "Post Body"
Optional Multi-image gallery to display on a grid.

messages.pattern: Must be alphanumerical and not contain any spaces or special characters

fields.helpText: Please note: Speakers should be excluded from Artist Collection pages: please set 'isExampleArtist' to TRUE for this to be the case. (Toggle is at the bottom of this form)
This is for the filtering
Please tag the artist with any relevant keywords such as genre, feel, function: examples: "Jazz", "Downtempo", "Intimate", ... You can create new tags by using the button on the right of this field.
The image for the lineup post-event
Text that goes before the website link
Select events that the artist has performed at
For the artist page. Put it in double quotes.
a shorter artist testimony, to fit into a slider. Remember to put in double quotes

example: https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/879634063&color=%23ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&show_teaser=true&visual=true
Youtube Video ID to embed (currently only in agency page modal). Example: wDoZ0Z_mQV0 -- from the full url: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wDoZ0Z_mQV0
For visual artists
For Festival: which partner community are they performing with?
Used for hiding in certain places.
if true, will hide in the /agency page (for example if the artist is not available for bookings)
Give the artist/band name

details about sizing, materials etc.
e.g. clothing, art, collectibles, etc.

What to display when the item has 'sold out' -- you can include links if wanted

** IMPORTANT ** IF THIS IS AN EVENT TICKET - YOU MUST START THE SLUG WITH 'event-[anything else]' -- This is because, for some reason, Webflow doesn't send the custom fields in the webhook so we can't simply check 'Merch Type'. This is a temporary fix and we can look into other solutions. ---- example: event-unheard-s2e1 // event-farrago-festival

fields.helpText: Determines whether this tag is present in the [/bookings] page within the artist search filters.

Rank, starting from 10 (high priority) to 1 (low priority). Higher ranks will be displayed first on the tag filters. Tags with the SAME rank will be displayed in the order that they were last published, with the newest displayed first. Tags without a rank will be considered rank 0 and hence displayed after all ranked tags.

fields.helpText: Client logo. Can be transparent background but please bear in mind the background of the site is dark, so the logo would need to be light. Alternatively - use a logo with a background
Short summary to be displayed on the 'partners' page. Keep it simple and highlight the main value proposition
Full client information breakdown. This is a rich text field and can contain: text (headings, paragraphs) - images - quotes - bullet points - embeds - links, etc.
Link to their website (Affiliate Link wherever possible)
Videom embed (youtube / vimeo) highlighting the clients highlights
16:9 aspect ratio ideally
